thread.title: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday
text: Photo: Danny Moloshok, AP FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 file photo, Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont, smiles while speaking during a fundraiser at the Avalon Hollywood, in Los Angeles. Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will be a guest on Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night show, airing this week from Brooklyn, N.Y. Sanders will appear on ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 file photo, Democratic... LOS ANGELES (AP) — Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will be a guest on Jimmy Kimmel's late-night show, airing this week from Brooklyn, New York. FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 file photo, Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont, smiles while speaking during a fundraiser at the Avalon Hollywood, in Los Angeles. Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will be a guest on Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night show, airing this week from Brooklyn, N.Y. Sanders will appear on ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 file photo, Democratic... LOS ANGELES (AP) — Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will be a guest on Jimmy Kimmel's late-night show, airing this week from Brooklyn, New York.
